W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the door, you find yourself in a world where stagnant smoke covers the sky like clouds.

W15_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: It's time to visit another world in search of your heart.
